agentCard.name: Budget Aware Rate Limiter Agent
agentCard.description: Intelligent budget-aware rate limiting system that automatically adjusts rate limits based on budget constraints and cost tracking. Provides progressive throttling, plugin priority management, and tight integration with cost estimator for budget-constrained quota management.
